```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(sf)
```
```{r}
# load the arrests
ar <- read_csv("../00_data/arrests_2017_2020.csv")
ar %>%
  head()
ar_sf <- ar %>%
  st_as_sf(coords = c("longitude", "latitude"), crs = 4326) %>% 
  # convert to projected coordinate system, state plan ny, feet
  st_transform(2263)
```
```{r}
# load shootings
st <- read_csv("../00_data/shootings_2017_2020.csv")
st %>%
  head()

st_sf <- st %>%
  st_as_sf(coords = c("longitude", "latitude"), crs = 4326) %>% 
  # convert to projected coordinate system, state plan ny, feet
  st_transform(2263)
```

```{r}
cp <- read_csv("../00_data/complaints_2017_2020.csv")
cp %>%
  head()

cp_sf <- cp %>%
  filter(!is.na(longitude) & !is.na(latitude)) %>%
  st_as_sf(coords = c("longitude", "latitude"), crs = 4326) %>% 
  # convert to projected coordinate system, state plan ny, feet
  st_transform(2263)
```

```{r}
# load oz data
nyc_oz <- st_read("../00_data/nyc_oz.geojson") %>% 
  # convert to boolean
  mutate(DESIGNATED = if_else(DESIGNATED == "True", TRUE, FALSE)) %>% 
  # convert to state plan coordinate system, feet
  st_transform(2263)
```


```{r}
nyc_oz %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_sf(aes(fill = DESIGNATED)) +
  theme_void()
```
```{r}
# load buffer
oz_buffer <- st_read("../00_data/oz_buffer.geojson") %>% 
  mutate(buffer = TRUE) %>% 
  select(buffer, geometry)

oz_buffer %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_sf() +
  theme_void()

oz_buffer %>% 
  head()
```



```{r}
# spatial joins
ar_oz <- ar_sf %>%
  st_join(nyc_oz, left = FALSE) %>% 
  st_join(oz_buffer, left = TRUE) %>% 
  mutate(buffer = if_else(is.na(buffer), FALSE, buffer))

ar_oz %>%
  as.data.frame() %>%
  group_by(DESIGNATED) %>%
  summarize(n = n())

ar_oz %>%
  as.data.frame() %>%
  group_by(DESIGNATED, buffer) %>%
  summarize(n = n())

ar_oz %>%
  head()
```

```{r}
st_oz <- st_sf %>%
  st_join(nyc_oz, left = FALSE) %>% 
  st_join(oz_buffer, left = TRUE) %>% 
  mutate(buffer = if_else(is.na(buffer), FALSE, buffer))

st_oz %>%
  as.data.frame() %>%
  group_by(DESIGNATED) %>%
  summarize(n = n())

st_oz %>%
  as.data.frame() %>%
  group_by(DESIGNATED, buffer) %>%
  summarize(n = n())

st_oz %>%
  head()
```
```{r}
cp_oz <- cp_sf %>%
  st_join(nyc_oz, left = FALSE)  %>% 
  st_join(oz_buffer, left = TRUE) %>% 
  mutate(buffer = if_else(is.na(buffer), FALSE, buffer))

cp_oz %>%
  as.data.frame() %>%
  group_by(DESIGNATED) %>%
  summarize(n = n())

cp_oz %>%
  as.data.frame() %>%
  group_by(DESIGNATED, buffer) %>%
  summarize(n = n())

cp_oz %>%
  head()
```
